column6: The drama persists! Lizzy's in a tizzy, trying to find the truth of Mr. Darcy's motivations, while dealing with her silly sisters and their persistently precocious ways! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:NANCY HAJESKI | penciller:Sonny Liew | inker:Hugo Petrus | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Aubrey Sitterson
